column5: Anybody know of reasonably priced drive in or boat in camps in the Pickle Lake area?

Mr W - you may want to drop an email to dwight and karen monck who run north of 51 outfitters. they have cabins available on little tarp lake (about 6-7 miles north of pickle) and they're the only cabins on that lake a i think you may be able to get into big tarp lake with them. there's no cabins on big tarp. these lakes are easy to find on any map north of pickle - big tarp is ovular and huge. check out their web site and if you contact them tell em "phishfearme" sent you - we've done lots of fly-ins with them but are doing some different water this year. phish
